title: How to Link Your Roblox Account to Discord: Quick and Easy Steps

steps.title: Navigate to Settings.
steps.content: Navigate to Settings. Open the Discord app on your phone or tablet, swipe right to reveal the left panel, tap your profile image, and tap the gear icon in the top right corner.

steps.title: Tap Connections.
steps.content: Tap Connections . It's located next to a puzzle piece icon.

steps.title: Tap Add.
steps.content: Tap Add . This button will open a list of icons for you to add another connection.

steps.title: Tap Roblox.
steps.content: Tap Roblox . You'll find the icon near the bottom of the menu, which will redirect you to your Roblox account. Sign in if you aren't already.

steps.title: Tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap Continue . You can select Change Account if you're signed into the wrong account.

steps.title: Tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap Continue . Review all the permissions that Discord will access regarding your Roblox account, such as your username, display name, avatar, and profile link; then scroll to the bottom and click Continue to accept these permissions.

steps.title: Tap Confirm and Give Access.
steps.content: Tap Confirm and Give Access . If you do not approve of the permissions, select Back . If Roblox determines that you're below the minimum age requirement for your region, you will be unable to proceed. If you meet the age requirement, you'll see a message saying, "Connected your Roblox account to Discord. You can close this window and return to Discord." Yay! [1] X Research source

steps.title: Why can't I connect Roblox to Discord?
steps.content: Why can't I connect Roblox to Discord? Roblox is accessible to more players, while Discord requires users to be at least 13. If your Roblox account indicates that you are younger than 13, you will not be able to link your Roblox and Discord accounts. The minimum age varies between 13-16, but 13 is the youngest minimum age in the US. If you're under 13, you cannot change your age on Roblox ; however, if you're over 13 and accidentally entered a date that makes you appear younger than 13, you can submit a ticket to Roblox and provide a government ID as proof of your age.

steps.title: How can I connect with other Roblox players on Discord?
steps.content: How can I connect with other Roblox players on Discord? You can search for Discord servers that cater to Roblox players or look on Discord .

steps.title: How can I display what Roblox game I'm playing on Discord?
steps.content: How can I display what Roblox game I'm playing on Discord? If you're playing Roblox on your computer, you need to have Roblox installed on your device. Navigate to Settings > Activity Privacy and toggle the switch next to "Share your detected activities with others" to the on position. This option won't work with the web client; you must use the app. [3] X Research source

steps.title: How do I stream Roblox on Discord?
steps.content: How do I stream Roblox on Discord? Start by opening and launching a Roblox game, then return to Discord and join a voice channel. Click the monitor with an arrow pointing outwards in the left panel to stream your game . [4] X Research source

steps.title: Why doesn't Discord detect Roblox?
steps.content: Why doesn't Discord detect Roblox? Ensure the game is listed in Settings > Registered Games . If it's not, click Add It! at the top of the page and select "Roblox."
